pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenic video captures a wide view of a massive waterfall system. The camera performs a slow pan from right to left, showcasing the numerous cascades of water tumbling over a long, rocky cliff covered in lush green vegetation. The entire landscape is framed by a dense, tropical forest.
